issue.title: C++: arrow::test::TestBase::MakePrimitive doesn't fill null_bitmap
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1081](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1081). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For `null_count > 0` the bitmap is not filled with any null bits. Thus the returned Array is invalid.
